name: blimpishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that suggests someone has old-fashioned military principles, only approves of their own country or culture, and would like things to be as they were in the past: He would blimpishly express contempt for "foreigners", which irritated his sister immensely. Many of the comments posted below the article were blimpishly reactionary and rude. Related word
